glossentry.glossdef:
A component and its parts can be made available by a provider under different licenses. This enables licensing depending on the context of use or the distribution channels in which the component is provided or transferred. These licenses are assigned to the component at the time of purchase and are referred to here as associated licenses. In contrast to associated licenses, effective licenses are the licenses under which a component is transferred. The associated and effective licenses of a component may differ. The derivation of the effective licenses is limited by the terms of the associated licenses and their options.
